techs.name: Heavy Industry
techs.quote: The more complex industrial products became, the harder industry itself became.

techs.name: Modern Oligarchy
techs.quote: As the economy became more complex, corruption schemes also became more complex, ultimately leading to the emergence of Oligarchs – the rulers of economic existence.

techs.name: MIC
techs.quote: The Military-Industrial Complex represents the final stage of development of the state army. МIC is a unified system for the production of military equipment that provides the state with an uninterrupted supply of advanced weapons.

techs.name: TNC
techs.quote: Transnational Corporations forever locked the planet in the shackles of capitalism

techs.name: Synthetic Alloys
techs.quote: Modern technologies have allowed us to create more and more advanced materials

techs.name: Complete State Management
techs.quote: Modern state is a hard-working united system, in which any mistake costs not money, but lifes

techs.name: Modern Warfare Strategy
techs.quote: Modern technology has allowed us to create more advanced materials and use them to design more advanced weapons.

techs.name: Hypersonic Technologies
techs.quote: Hypersonic technologies has opened up the greatest speeds the world has ever seen.
